title: cmd/godoc: document what godoc can do
body:
Over the last couple of months I've learned that godoc does alot of usefull stuf, however I can't really find any good documentation for all the godoc capabilities in a single place.

For example the documenting of examples for godoc are documented in the testing package: http://golang.org/pkg/testing/#hdr-Examples. However I wouldn't look there for examples in documenting my code.

A single document with alle the capabilities of the godoc tool would be really usefull.
